description: This file provides frontend utilities for managing notification persistence using localStorage, including loading, saving, toggling read status, marking all as read, counting unread notifications, and resetting notifications. It interacts with static initial notifications and handles merging persisted data.

methods.name: safeJsonParse
methods.description: Safely parses a JSON string, returning a fallback value on error.

methods.name: makeId
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier with an optional prefix.

methods.name: normalizeSeedNotification
methods.description: Normalizes a notification object from seed data, ensuring required fields are set.

methods.name: makeSeed
methods.description: Creates an array of normalized seed notifications from static initial data.

methods.name: loadNotifications
methods.description: Loads notifications from localStorage, merging with seed data if available.

methods.name: saveNotifications
methods.description: Persists the notifications array to localStorage.

methods.name: toggleNotificationRead
methods.description: Toggles the read/unread status of a notification by id.

methods.name: getUnreadCount
methods.description: Returns the count of unread notifications.

methods.name: resetNotifications
methods.description: Clears localStorage to reset notifications to initial seed state.
